attributes.action: Provide a better pension for Senior Citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a very large preportion of old age pensioners who are now falling into debt with their credit cards etc because the exisiting state pension is insufficient to provide a normal day to day standard of living, with ever rising food costs, heating bills,council tax's etc. Let us see the PM and his cabinet live on our current pensions.  We are the worst off pensioners in Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
